duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively source and cultivate qualified healthcare candidates through various channels.
Build and maintain long-lasting relationships with candidates and develop an understanding of their personal and professional goals.
Identify and discuss available assignment opportunities to meet candidate needs.
Facilitate submission and compliance process for placement.
Provide top-notch customer service and ensure candidate and client expectations are exceeded.
Achieve results and regularly surpass goals.
Contribute positively to corporate culture and work hard/have fun culture.

education_certification.credential: At least 1 year of proven success in travel nurse recruiting.
